thread.title: EU referendum: 'We're all Eurosceptics now' - Michael Fallon
thread.title_full: EU referendum: 'We're all Eurosceptics now' - Michael Fallon - BBC News

author: BBC
title: EU referendum: 'We're all Eurosceptics now' - Michael Fallon
text:
Media playback is unsupported on your device EU referendum: 'We're all Eurosceptics now' - Michael Fallon 18 October 2015 Last updated at 12:55 BST
The Defence Secretary, Michael Fallon, has said that everyone around the Cabinet table is sceptical about Europe.
Speaking on the Marr show, Mr Fallon said there were no "Euro-fanatics" around David Cameron's top table, adding that everyone was behind the PM's bid to reform the EU.
He dismissed newspaper reports that potential rebels who might criticise the result of his renegotiations would be reshuffled.
